name: Rayman Redemption
description:
A reimagination of the original Rayman made by Ryemanni.

"Rayman Redemption is a reimagination of the original Rayman game from 1995. It features a lot of new content, including new worlds, levels, minigames and other stuff to collect and complete.

Check out the stand alone level editor:
https://gamejolt.com/games/Rayman_ReDesigner/539216

The game was build and tested on Windows 10, so other compatability is not currenty guaranteed."
